snippet.title: Tuning fork \- Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
snippet.description:
* Tuning fork \- Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tuning_fork‎
* Cached * Similar
Wikipedia
Loading...
A tuning fork is an acoustic resonator in the form of a two-pronged fork with the prongs (tines) formed from a U-shaped bar of elastic metal (usually steel).
‎Description - ‎Calculation of frequency - ‎Uses - ‎See also
